definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: An increasing number of people are realising the neccesity to protect enviroment.
sentences.chinese: 世界上越来越多的人认识到加强环境保护的必要性。

sentences.english: He Lin recognized the necessity of modernization of philosophical methodology.
sentences.chinese: 贺麟清醒的认识到哲学方法论现代化的必要性。

sentences.english: Making the law by judges has its necessity and objectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 法官制法有其必要性和客观性。

sentences.english: The article analyzed the advantages of pricing through quantity bill and the necessity to be carried out.
sentences.chinese: 分析了工程量清单计价法的优势及实施的必要性。

sentences.english: If you learn because you think it necessary, that's a need.
sentences.chinese: 假如你因为意识到必要性而学，那是一种需要。
我喜欢这种必要性辩护。

sentences.english: It can be seen as a summary of human longtime experience of which confirmed to recognize the essence of things.
sentences.chinese: 认识事物本质的必要性是人类长期经验的总结。

sentences.english: Heidegger revealed the necessity for explicitly restating the question of Being.
sentences.chinese: 海德格的诠释现象学揭露了重提存有问题的必要性。

sentences.english: In this papert the classification and method of the digital image compression technique as well as its application to astronomy are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 概述了数字图像压缩技术在天文领域应用的必要性。

sentences.english: A restructuring wouldn't remove the need for painful budget overhauls.
sentences.chinese: 重组改变不了忍痛实施预算改革的必要性。

sentences.english: Modal logic is the logic of necessity and possibility.
sentences.chinese: 模态逻辑是关于必要性和可能性的逻辑。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the necessity and main ways of training technological students for the quality of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 论述了培养工科学生人文素质的必要性和主要途径。

sentences.english: To some modern societies the computer is one of the necessaries of life.
sentences.chinese: 一些现代社会中的电脑就是其中的必要性的生活方式。

sentences.english: First of all, the author expounded that it is necessary to study the supervising mode inside company of our country .
sentences.chinese: 首先，阐明了研究公司内部监督模式问题的必要性。

sentences.english: The necessity of evaluating manufacturing-system oriented simulation software is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论述了评价制造系统仿真软件的必要性。

sentences.english: The necessity of adopting microprogramming techniques in the BIU is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了微程序控制的必要性。

definition: to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
